DOC.brief_summary: Many woman undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) ask doctor behavior avoid , behavior emphasize IVF cycle . This study examine effect health habit surround exercise , smoking , alcohol , sleep , caffeine , herbal medication , acupuncture , diet pregnancy rate IVF cycle . The purpose study determine lifestyle behavior significant impact pregnancy rate treatment IVF . This observational study conduct private academically-affiliated infertility clinic include 118 woman age 44 schedule undergo IVF treatment . All subject ask complete health history survey time enrollment daily survey day IVF cycle . The primary outcome clinical pregnancy rate .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Lifestyle Behaviors In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Outcome
DOC.criteria: Female Boston IVF infertility patient undergo IVF treatment Age 1844 year Able read , understand sign inform consent English Willing able comply study requirement Must well verse use personal computer internet must access internetconnected computer seven day per week
